com.burstly.lib.feature.currency
Interface ICurrencyManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CurrencyManager
public interface ICurrencyManager

Currency manager is responsible for operating with Currency. Increase/decrease methods work offline, but checkForUpdate() works asynchronously.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

Method Summary
 void addCurrencyListener(ICurrencyListener listener)
          Adds a listener to collection to be notified about currency related events.

Method Detail

initManager

void initManager(Context context,
                 String publisherId)
Init manager before any actions being made using it. Implementors have to take care about thread safe.

Parameters:
context - Context currenct context
publisherId - String publisher id to initialize with

initManager

void initManager(Context context,
                 String publisherId,
                 String userId)
Init manager before any actions being made using it. Implementors have to take care about thread safe.

Parameters:
context - Context currenct context
publisherId - String publisher id to initialize with
userId - String user id to initialize with

addCurrencyListener

void addCurrencyListener(ICurrencyListener listener)
Adds a listener to collection to be notified about currency related events.

Parameters:
listener - ICurrencyListener listener to add

removeCurrencyListener

void removeCurrencyListener(ICurrencyListener listener)
Removes a listener from collection.

Parameters:
listener - ICurrencyListener listener to remove

removeAllCurrencyListeners

void removeAllCurrencyListeners()
Remove all ICurrencyListener listeners.

backupFileNames

String[] backupFileNames()
                         throws IllegalStateException
Returns list of currency related filenames to use in FileBackupHelper constructor to backup them too.

Returns:
String array of file names to backup
Throws:
IllegalStateException - it thrown if CurrencyManager has not been initialized yet

checkForUpdate

void checkForUpdate()
                    throws IOException,
                           IllegalArgumentException,
                           IllegalStateException
Check for update for currency amount on server. This is asynchronous method, the result of its execution will pushed in ICurrencyListener if there any. Currently check for update is made using init. publisher id.

Throws:
IOException - is thrown if there is no network connection
IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if publisher id is invalid
IllegalStateException - it thrown if CurrencyManager has not been initialized yet

getBalance

int getBalance(String currency)
               throws IllegalArgumentException,
                      IllegalStateException
Returns balance for given publisher id. Using publisher passed in init method.

Parameters:
currency - String currency name
Returns:
Integer current balance for given account
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - publisher id is incorrect
IllegalStateException - it thrown if CurrencyManager has not been initialized yet

decreaseBalance

int decreaseBalance(int amount,
                    String currency)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                           IllegalStateException
Decrease balance on given currency amount.

Parameters:
amount - int amount to decrease
currency - String currency name
Returns:
int total currency amount after decreasing
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - in case if account info is invalid
IllegalStateException - it thrown if CurrencyManager has not been initialized yet

getUserId

String getUserId()
Get actual user id related to latest successfull CurrencyManager initialization.

Returns:
String actual user id or null if CurrencyManager has not been properly initialized before

increaseBalance

int increaseBalance(int amount,
                    String currency)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                           IllegalStateException
Increase balance on given currency amount.

Parameters:
amount - int amount to increase
currency - String currency name
Returns:
int total currency amount after increasing
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - in case if account info is invalid
IllegalStateException - it thrown if CurrencyManager has not been initialized yet
